law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Singing on a broad range of men and women with cohomology cavity, cavity with male falsetto.
sentences.chinese: 唱法上音域寬廣，男女同腔同調，男腔用假聲。

sentences.english: Mixed chorus is vital for learners to improve their singing.
sentences.chinese: 混聲唱法對聲樂學習者聲樂演唱水平的提高至關重要。

sentences.english: Above-head resonating is called quintessence and key in bel conto singing.
sentences.chinese: 面罩共鳴被稱爲美聲唱法的精髓和關鍵。

sentences.english: All the songs are sung by local artists, not in the way the star folklores are sung.
sentences.chinese: 每一首歌都是跟本來鄉土原來的唱法那樣唱的。

sentences.english: This article expounds the superiority in mixed chorus and the main points for a training in mixed chorus.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了混聲唱法的優越性及混聲法訓練的要點。

sentences.english: The loud, sharp singing style in Beijing operas is attributable to what?
sentences.chinese: 京劇中高亢嘹亮的唱法是因爲什麼原因？

sentences.english: This is also the essence of "the Principle of High Efficiency and Low Consumption" in bel canto.
sentences.chinese: 這也是“美聲唱法”中“高效低耗原則”的本質所在。

sentences.english: In conclusion, I indicate the development of Bel canto in musical.
sentences.chinese: 結論指出了美聲唱法在音樂劇中的發展問題。

sentences.english: In spite of is which kind sing a method, all have biggest of individuality.
sentences.chinese: 不論是哪種唱法，都有着極大的個別性。

sentences.english: It is the blueprint of the teaching of vocal music in China.
sentences.chinese: 美聲唱法成了中國聲樂教學的藍本。

sentences.english: He learned to bel canto in a conservatory.
sentences.chinese: 他在音樂學院學習的是美聲唱法。

sentences.english: The triple factors determine the artistic result of the national singing style.
sentences.chinese: 這三重因素決定着民族唱法的藝術效果。

sentences.english: Mixing singing method is efficient and scientific application of that.
sentences.chinese: 混聲唱法的有效運用是科學的唱法。

definition: falsetto, same as 假聲|假声
falsetto/opposite: natural or true voice 真聲|真声[zhen1 sheng1]
natural voice/modal voice/true voice/opposite: falsetto 假聲|假声[jia3 sheng1]
sung performance/to sing for an audience
